Text:
Edit: so i already finished the game and had no problems with it. and i suppose i can say it works 100%, no problems occured while playing, and its easy btw.. just install the patc and you have it working.

bobby493 do like this..
install the game. unmount the game image, and install this patch, then play the game.
thats how i did. after i extracted the game and installed, (or just installed) i installed the patch afterwards.. and it worked, already finished the game and worked perfectly..

Works perfectly for me!

If you get some problems about the cd, I think it's wise of you all to the file called "dmv.dll" (downloaded) to your games destination folder -> bin

That's worked for me...

(sorry for my bad english, I'm norwegian...)

should be:
